title: Himi 343
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ke tau me’a ngāue ‘aki
‘A e anga’ofa,
‘A hotau ‘Otua lelei,
‘O fai fakataha.
2.
Pea tuku kitautolu,
‘I he fuakava,
Ki hotau ‘Eiki, ko Sīsū,
Pea fai ma’u ai pē.
3.
Ngata mei he houa ni
Ke tau tokanga ma’u,
Pea fakaongo lelei,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio.
4.
Pea tau manatu ma’u pē,
Ki he lea pau ni,
Pea ke tau fai ma’u ai pē,
‘Ene fekau lelei.
5.
’Oua na’a tau li’aki,
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
Ka tau tauhi loto tui,
‘Ene folofoa.
6.
Pea kapau ‘oku lelei,
Ki he ‘Afiona,
Ke ke hā’ele mai, ‘Eiki,
Pea fakapapau.
7.
Ke ‘ai kia kimautolu,
‘A e ta’ata’a,
‘O homau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū,
‘Oku fakama’a.
8.
Pea tohi ‘i ‘olunga,
‘A homau hingoa,
Mo ke tauhi kimautolu,
‘O a’u ki ho ‘Aho. *
